header.title: Slab Market
header.subtitle: The premium marketplace for authenticated graded collectibles

home.title: The Premium Marketplace for Graded Trading Cards
home.subtitle: Buy and sell authenticated graded slabs with confidence. Real-time certificate verification, escrow protection, and investment-grade analytics for serious collectors and investors.
home.authenticatedSlabs: AUTHENTICATED SLABS FROM TRUSTED GRADING COMPANIES
home.everythingYouNeed: Everything you need to buy, sell, and track graded collectibles
home.realTimeVerificationDesc: Instant certificate validation with PSA, BGS, CGC, SGC, and more. Every slab verified against official databases.
home.advancedFilteringDesc: Search by grade, subgrades, certificate number, pop report, year, edition, and more. Find exactly what you're looking for.
home.secureTransactionsDesc: Escrow protection, insured shipping, and temperature-controlled delivery options for high-value items.
home.investmentAnalyticsDesc: Track price trends, market indices, ROI reports, and get price alerts on your watchlist items.
home.featuredListingsDesc: Hot deals, newly added slabs, and premium featured listings. Never miss a great opportunity.
home.hotDealsDesc: Best prices and most popular listings
home.addedTodayDesc: Fresh listings added in the last 24 hours
home.buyerProtectionDesc: Comprehensive buyer protection program with delivery guarantees, return policies, and transparent dispute resolution.
home.categoriesSubtitle: Starting with Pokemon TCG, expanding to more categories soon
home.joinPremierMarketplace: Join the premier marketplace for authenticated graded collectibles

marketplace.title: Browse Cards
marketplace.subtitle: unique cards available
marketplace.refineSearch: Refine your search with advanced filters
marketplace.noCardsFound: No cards found matching your criteria

sell.title: Sell Your Slab
sell.verifyCertificateDesc: Enter your grading certificate details for automatic verification
sell.certificateNumberHint: Found on the front or back of your graded slab
sell.whyVerifyDesc: Verified certificates build buyer trust and are highlighted with a verification badge. We'll check this against the official grading company database.
sell.cardDetailsDesc: Provide detailed information about your graded card
sell.descriptionPlaceholder: Describe the condition, any notable features, or history of this card...
sell.uploadPhotosDesc: High-quality photos increase buyer confidence and sell faster
sell.dropPhotos: Drop photos here or click to upload
sell.photoRequirements: PNG, JPG up to 10MB each (Maximum 8 photos)
sell.photoTipsDesc: Include front and back views, close-ups of the grade label, and any notable features. Good lighting and clear focus help your listing stand out.
sell.setPriceDesc: Choose your listing type and set a competitive price
sell.listingCreatedDesc: Your slab has been successfully listed on the marketplace
sell.provideCertGrade: Please provide certificate number and grade
sell.provideCardSet: Please provide card name and set
sell.signInToUpload: Please sign in to upload images
sell.signInToCreate: Please sign in to create a listing
sell.maxImagesDesc: You can upload up to {max} images

cart.title: Shopping Cart
cart.subtitle: Review the slabs you want to purchase before heading to checkout.
cart.emptyDesc: Add slabs from the marketplace and come back to complete your purchase.

checkout.title: Checkout
checkout.subtitle: Provide your shipping details and confirm the payment stub to complete this order.
checkout.buyerDetailsDesc: Your data is written to Supabase as part of a checkout stub. No real payment is taken.
checkout.sandboxCheckoutDesc: This flow simulates checkout behavior. You can use any data - we don't contact an external payment processor.
checkout.orderNotesPlaceholder: Add packaging instructions or delivery notes
checkout.orderSummaryDesc: Review the slabs and totals before confirming.
checkout.checkoutCompleteDesc: Test payment has been approved. In a real system, we would start the fulfillment process.
